name: Streadata.io API Gallery - Google Site Verification
description: This is a repository of google site verification APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: Google Site Verification
apis.description: The Google Site Verification API lets you develop applications or services that automate the process of verifying that the authenticated user owns a domain or website. This is important, since some Google services can only be used by site owners.
